SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FUNDING_NO AS projectNo, FUNDING_NAME AS projectName, CASE WHEN FUNDING_END_DATE>SYSDATE THEN TO_CHAR(FUNDING_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '0' END AS projectEnd, FUNDING_CURRENT_SUM AS projectPrice, DIV_NO AS divNo, FUNDING_FILE_PATH AS projectImg FROM FUNDING JOIN FUNDING_FILE USING(FUNDING_NO) WHERE FUNDING_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT PROJECT_NO, DONATION_TITLE, CASE WHEN DONATION_ENDDATE>SYSDATE THEN TO_CHAR(DONATION_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '0' END, DONATION_CASH, DIV_NO, DONATION_IMGPATH FROM DONATION WHERE DONATION_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_NAME, CASE WHEN GRP_END>SYSDATE THEN TO_CHAR(GRP_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '0' END, ORDER_PRICE, G.DIV_NO, THUMBPATH FROM GROUP_TBL G JOIN PRICE_TBL USING (PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_NAME, CASE WHEN AUCTION_END>SYSDATE THEN TO_CHAR(AUCTION_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '0' END, CASE WHEN ORDER_PRICE=0 THEN ORDER_PRICE ELSE AUCTION_PRICE END, A.DIV_NO, AUCTION_PIC FROM AUCTION_TBL A LEFT JOIN PRICE_TBL USING (PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
) ORDER BY PROJECTEND DESC
